title.rendered: 9 Pcs Sports Headband Set, Breathable Sweatband with Wristbands

content.rendered:
• HEADBAND SET: When you purchase the headband set, you will get 3 headbands and 6 wristbands for any sporting occasion.
  • HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: The headband is made of 92% high quality polyester and 8% performance stretch spandex which is soft and comfortable to wear, breathable, durable and it can absorb sweat.
  • SPECIAL DESIGN: The headbands with a non-slip design and stretch design that can fit different head sizes and stay in place during intense workouts and easy to wear and adjust for all users, comfortable and doesn’t slip off easily.
  • CLEAN & REUSABLE: After using the headband, you can reuse it by washing it with water directly. The sweatband can retain the form, color and elasticity for years.
  • PERFECT GIFT: The headbands are versatile and can be used for different sports and fitness activities. It is a great gift option for men or women and the person who receives this gift will surely feel warm.
